comment.author: 23144340@N00
comment._content:
Sport. Giochi Olimpici di Amsterdam del 1928, Paesi Bassi.
Due schermisti con fioretto si stringono la mano.

comment.author: 29418639@N06
comment._content: Sports. 1928 Olympics, Amsterdam, Netherlands.Fencing. Two participants with fencing-swords shake each other's hand.

comment.author: 29418639@N06
comment._content: I didn't know the Netherlands translates into Paessi Bassi (which is kind of logical since in French - that I do happen to know - it translates into Pays Bas). I love the Italian name for our country :-).
